explains: adv. 煞费苦心地；费力地

sentences.en: As with Sisyphus, the boulder was painstakingly rolled upwards only to tumble back down again in an absurd exercise of futility.
sentences.cn: 和西西弗斯一样，巨石费力地向上滚动，结果又滚了下来，徒劳无功。

sentences.en: Broken bones were painstakingly pieced together and reshaped.
sentences.cn: 断裂的骨头被十分小心地拼凑到一起重新成形。

sentences.en: The cause they contrived so painstakingly also ended in failure.
sentences.cn: 他们惨淡经营的事业也以失败而告终。
